item.title: FT Most Read: Sunday, July 7, 2024 at 1:05 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Biden rejects calls to quit presidential race as clamour grows for his exit
2. Starmer warns UK that ‘broken’ public services will take time to fix
3. Sex offender worked at Goldman Sachs months after conviction
4. Trump distances himself from right-wing ‘Project 2025’ policy blueprint
5. Reformist Pezeshkian wins Iran’s presidential election
item.guid: FT Most Read: Sunday, July 7, 2024 at 1:05 AM UTC
